mapper.select: SELECT /* com.qs.www.schedule.model.dao.HolidayDAO#selectAllHolidayType() */ A.HOLIDAY_CODE , A.HOLIDAY_NAME , A.HOLIDAY_TYPE , A.DAY_NUMBER , A.HOLIDAY_NOTE , A.USE_YN FROM TBL_HOLIDAY_TYPE A
mapper.insert: INSERT /* com.qs.www.schedule.model.dao.HolidayDAO#insertHolidayLog() */ INTO TBL_MEMBER_HOLIDAY_LOG A ( A.HOLIDAY_LOG_NO , A.MEMBER_NO , A.LOG_OCCUR_DATE , A.LOG_NOTE , A.LOG_TYPE , A.HOLIDAY_CODE , A.HOLIDAY_DURING_DATE , A.RULE_CODE , IS_PRODUCED_BY_RULE ) VALUES ( SEQ_HOLIDAY_LOG_NO.NEXTVAL , #{ memberNo } , SYSDATE , #{ logNote } , #{ logType } , #{ holidayCode } , #{ holidayDuringDate } , NULL , NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT /* com.qs.www.schedule.model.dao.HolidayDAO#selectHolidayLogNum() */ LAST_NUMBER FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME = 'SEQ_HOLIDAY_LOG_NO'

SELECT /* com.qs.www.schedule.model.dao.ScheduleDAO#selectMyholidayReport() */ A.REPORT_NO , A.REPORT_DATE , A.MEMBER_NO , A.DOCUMENT_NO , A.REPORT_NOTE , A.REPORT_STATUS , A.LINE_NAME , A.REPORT_TITLE FROM TBL_REPORT A WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = #{ no } AND A.DOCUMENT_NO = 6 AND REPORT_STATUS != '회수' ORDER BY A.REPORT_NO DESC
